message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
Meet me halfway, let's split it
Take the low offer, it's still better than nothing!
I'll take a slightly bigger share, but still be reasonable
I'm willing to give you a bigger share, but I still need to get something!
I'll take a bigger share, but I'm willing to give you a small consolation
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going to get nothing!
I'm not budging, you'll have to make a better offer
I'll give you almost everything, but I need something!
I'm getting desperate, but I'm not giving up yet
I'll give you almost everything, it's almost over!
Last chance, take it or leave it
